import React from "react"; import moment from "moment-timezone"; import { Row, Col, Card, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Image, Button } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCogs, faShoppingCart } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import BS5Logo from "../assets/img/technologies/bootstrap-5-logo.svg"; import ReactLogo from "../assets/img/technologies/react-logo.svg"; export default (props) => { const currentYear = moment().get("year"); const showSettings = props.showSettings; const toggleSettings = (toggle) => { props.toggleSettings(toggle); } return (
